Drug : Deferasirox orally administer dose 20 mg/kg daily even 5 day . Other Name : ICL670 Arm 2 : Patients treat 6 day combination deferoxamine DFP . Interventions : - Drug : Deferoxamine - Drug : DFP Drug : Deferoxamine Deferoxamine administer subcutaneously 8 hour 5 day dose 40 mg/kg .
